airConditioningSystems.name: Central Air Conditioning System
airConditioningSystems.description: Provides cooling for large spaces and is ideal for homes or offices with ductwork.

airConditioningSystems.name: Ductless Mini-Split System
airConditioningSystems.description: A versatile system for homes without ductwork, allowing for individual room cooling.

airConditioningSystems.name: Window Air Conditioner
airConditioningSystems.description: A compact unit designed to cool a single room by being installed in a window.

airConditioningSystems.name: Portable Air Conditioner
airConditioningSystems.description: A mobile solution for cooling small areas, often requiring a window vent kit.

airConditioningSystems.name: Hybrid Air Conditioner
airConditioningSystems.description: Combines an electric air conditioner with a gas furnace for energy efficiency.

airConditioningSystems.name: Smart Air Conditioner
airConditioningSystems.description: A Wi-Fi-enabled system that can be controlled remotely via a smartphone app.
